title: Status

StatusNotConnected.header1: Failed to connect to the API
StatusNotConnected.paragraph1: <0>Start een BTFS daemon in een terminal:</0>
StatusNotConnected.paragraph2: <0>Lees <1>de handleiding</1> om te starten met BTFS.</0>

AskToEnable.label: Help improve this app by sending anonymous usage data.

bandwidthStatsDisabled: You have the bandwidth metrics disabled. You can enable them by typing the command below or changing the key <1>Swarm.DisableBandwidthMetrics</1> to <3>false</3> on <5>Settings</5>. Then, you need to restart the BTFS daemon to apply the changes.
